title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Project-Based Critical Thinking Development in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Academic Writing and Discussion Skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can write five or more critical analysis comments on an online discussion platform.
Learners can revise project deliverables three or more times incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can manage team project schedules with 80% or higher adherence using a SCRUM board-based collaboration tool.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
